doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mohammad Hossain
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Mohammad Hossain is a highly experienced neurosurgeon and spinal surgeon in Bangladesh, specializing in spinal and brain surgeries, head injuries, stroke surgery, brain hemorrhages, brain tumor surgery, back pain, sciatica, paralysis, headaches, and convulsions. He is a professor of neurosurgery at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital and has received advanced training in spine surgery from the USA and endoscopic spine surgery from Switzerland. Notably, he introduced endoscopic disc surgery in Bangladesh in 2006 and pioneered endoscopic pituitary surgery. He provides consultations at Popular Diagnostic Center, Dhanmondi, from 6 PM to 9 PM (except Fridays).

doctor.name: Dr. S.I.M. Khairun Nabi Khan
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Spine, Nerve, Stroke) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. S.I.M. Khairun Nabi Khan is a renowned Neurosurgery Specialist and Surgeon with expertise in brain, spine, nerve, and stroke-related conditions. He holds an MBBS degree and an MS in Neurosurgery, making him highly skilled in performing complex neurosurgical procedures. As an Associate Professor of Neurosurgery at Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University Hospital, he specializes in treating brain tumors, spinal cord injuries, stroke, herniated discs, hydrocephalus, and other neurological disorders. Patients can consult him at Labaid Specialized Hospital, Dhanmondi, during his visiting hours from 3 PM to 6 PM on Saturdays, Mondays, and Wednesdays.

doctor.name: Dr. Gaousul Azam
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine & Stroke Surgery) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Gaousul Azam is a highly skilled neurosurgeon specializing in brain, nerve, spine, and stroke surgery. He holds an MBBS, BCS (Health), and an MS in Neurosurgery, with advanced fellowships in microscopic and endoscopic brain and spine surgery from Turkey, India, and Korea. As an Assistant Professor of Neurosurgery at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, he provides expert treatment for conditions such as brain tumors, spinal cord injuries, herniated discs, stroke-related complications, and nerve disorders. Dr. Gaousul Azam consults patients at Bangladesh Centre for Rehabilitation, located at 234/C, Katabon More, New Elephant Road, Dhaka – 1205, during visiting hours from 3 PM to 6 PM on Saturdays, Mondays, and Wednesdays.

doctor.name: Dr. A.M. Rejaus Satter
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Spinal Cord Surgery) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. A M Rejaus Satter graduated from Mymensingh Medical College. He obtained FCPS from BCPS and MS on Neurosurgery from Dhaka Medical College under BSMMU. He worked in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU), Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital and Dhaka Medical College & Hospital during his postgraduate training. He has been exposed to all ranges of cranial emergencies starting from trauma to intracerebral hematomas and strokes; entire ranges of emergency spinal decompression, stabilization and fusion; full spectrum of routine cases like brain tumors (supra and infratentorial, intra or extra axial), trans-sphenoidal surgery for sellar – suprasellar tumors, spinal tumors; congenital and pediatric neurosurgical disorders; degenerative spine diseases; endoscopic neurosurgical procedures; vascular disorders like aneurysms and AVMs. He has multiple publications in national and international journals.

doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shah Newaz is a highly skilled neurosurgery specialist and surgeon in Dhaka, holding qualifications of MBBS, BCS (Health), and MS in Neurosurgery from BSMMU. He treats a wide range of conditions related to the brain, nerves, spine, and stroke, including brain tumors, spinal injuries, nerve compression, herniated discs, and neurological trauma. Dr. Shah Newaz serves as a Neurosurgeon at Sir Salimullah Medical College & Mitford Hospital. He provides consultations at Islami Bank Specialized & General Hospital, Nayapaltan (71-72, VIP Road, Nayapaltan, Dhaka) from 3.00pm to 7.00pm, closed on Thursdays and Fridays.

doctor.name: Dr. Md Mamunur Rashid
doctor.info: Dr. Md Mamunur Rashid is a skilled neurosurgery specialist in Dhaka, holding MBBS and MS (Neurosurgery) qualifications. He currently serves as an Assistant Professor of Neurosurgery at Uttara Adhunik Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Md Mamunur Rashid provides expert treatment for brain tumors, head injuries, stroke surgery, spine diseases, nerve compressions, slipped discs, and other neurological conditions. He offers consultations at Labaid Diagnostic, Uttara (Unit 01), located at House # 15, Road # 12, Sector # 06, Uttara, Dhaka. His chamber is open from 4pm to 6pm, except on Fridays.

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Shahidur Rahman Sikder
doctor.specialty: Neurosurgery (Brain, Nerve, Spine, Stroke) Specialist Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Shahidur Rahman Sikder is a skilled neurosurgery (brain, nerve, spine, stroke) specialist surgeon in Dhaka, with qualifications including MBBS (DMC), BCS, MRCS (England), MS (Neurosurgery), and multiple fellowships in endovascular, microvascular, and skull base neurosurgery from Japan and Bengaluru. He is a member of AO Spine and currently serves as Assistant Registrar in Endovascular and Stroke Neurosurgery at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Sikder treats conditions such as brain tumors, stroke, spine disorders, nerve compression, hydrocephalus, aneurysms, and head injuries. He consults patients at Green Life Hospital, Dhaka (Room 306, 32, Bir Uttam Shafiullah Sarak, Dhanmondi) from 3pm to 6pm (Closed: Thursday & Friday).
